text: Emily VanCamp and Josh Bowman, 29, who played an unhappily married couple on Revenge, did indeed get ( happily ) engaged in real life last May. But no wedding date has been set. VanCamp, 31, returns to TV as nurse Nicolette Nevin in the new Fox series The Resident January 21. The fast - paced medical drama centers on a tough senior resident ( Matt Czuchry ) who runs an idealistic young doctor ( Manish Dayal ) through the first - year gauntlet. VanCamp says her character is “ based on a real - life nurse who was a whistle - blower to a corrupt situation in a hospital. ”
